price: 19. Mabe kowuta epai ya Nkolo nayo ekwelaki yango bazali kolala,
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
